crypto.name: AES zippy
crypto.desc:
Author: mcsch

Our AES encryption service is zippy fast! Just provide your plaintext and nonce. BUT no nonsense allowed, we track everything.

crypto.name: C.M.P.R.W
crypto.desc:
Author: MHZ

Some say that 75% of rock paper scissor matches end up in a tie. We suggest a more interesting one.

crypto.name: Noisy Neighbour
crypto.desc:
offline
Author: LosFuzzys

I heard Coppersmith attacks small public exponents. I masked mine with a massive random value just to be safe. Bigger is always better, right?

crypto.name: Secret Sharing Platfrom
crypto.desc:
Author: xyhlon

Have Fun Sharing Secrets!

crypto.name: hypercube
crypto.desc:
crypto hard
Author: fanosta

Introducing hypercube, the hot new cipher that combines Ascon, AES, SHA256, and SKINNY. I am sure it is secure, but if you do manage to break it, I'll give you the flag.

misc.name: IcySlide2
misc.desc:
rev android
Author: LetsFailNoob

As last year's IcySlide Android challenge had no solves, I figured I'd at least try to explain how the challenge should have worked. I definitely did all the comments myself. Hopefully they are helpful!

misc.name: RFC 1035
misc.desc:
Author: ansa

It's not DNS. There's no way it's DNS. It was DNS.

misc.name: Repo Viewer
misc.desc:
linux
Author: hweissi

I don't trust Markdown files, so I wrote a service that displays them for me!

Send it a git bundle and it will show you the README.md inside.

misc.name: Repo Viewer Revenge
misc.desc:
linux
Author: hweissi

My trusty coreutils have failed me! Maybe rust can save the day?

misc.name: Typst Lotto
misc.desc:
Author: ecomaikgolf.com

Let's play typst lottery!

misc.name: best food
misc.desc:
osint
Author: prod1101.com

We all have that one teammate who promises to deliver challenges for the CTF, but always just barely makes it in time, leaving no room for testing. Usually, it works out in the end...

But not this time. They’re so late that the CTF is already live, and all we have is a half-finished challenge and a lot of frustration!

The last message we got from the author said: "Sry for being late this year. Next year for sure. I’ll hide in my favourite food place until this blows over. uwu"

We remember the original goal of the challenge was to find their favorite restaurant, so maybe we can still salvage something from the existing code.

Can you uncover where the culprit is hiding and bring them to justice? There might even be a little reward waiting for you in the restaurant’s review section...

misc.name: findme v2
misc.desc:
Author: Mucki

This year my friend sent me another pdf, I do not know what he wants form me.

misc.name: gitresethard
misc.desc:
intro
Author: ecomaikgolf.com

Kevin joined our company.
Kevin took a shit on the carpet.
Kevin git reseted --hard the entire repo.
Kevin force pushed.
Kevin left the company.
Now its your turn to fix the mess. You get the compressed disk with the repository.

Note: the repo is completely safe

misc.name: typstmk
misc.desc:
Author: ecomaikgolf.com

The cutting-edge Typst build tool, now with extra compilations!

Note: /tmp should be writeable

pwn.name: Flip Flip Hooray
pwn.desc:
Author: ecomaikgolf.com

arm64 latest kernel + KASLR + 1 blind bitflip -> root

Fun isn't it?

pwn.name: Hyprice
pwn.desc:
Author: PaideiaDilemma

A gamified dotfile manager that doesn't sacrifice on its looks.

pwn.name: Writergate
pwn.desc:
Author: PaideiaDilemma

Now that you can stay above the drama, take in this familiar setting and pop yourself a shell if you can.

pwn.name: Writergate Warmup
pwn.desc:
easy pwn misc warmup
Author: PaideiaDilemma

Can you wrap your head around the latest scandals? Frame your concerns and keep them for yourself.

Hope you have a great warmup!

pwn.name: notally safe
pwn.desc:
Author: huksys

There are soo many note-taking CLIs out there, but most of them have gaping vunlnerabilities or do not give you an easy way to get your notes back out and lock you in! This situation has to change, so we've made our own: notally_safe!

rev.name: C2
rev.desc:
Author: Xer0

 Our rev guy: Idk, just decrypt the file.

rev.name: CriticallyAcclaimed Extreme
rev.desc:
Author: Riggle

Hey, remember last time I wrote an original game? I ended up recovering the source code and made improvements! Unfortunately it's gone again, and I only have the server binary...

Pray, return to the waking sands and find the source code!

rev.name: Wisdom
rev.desc:
encryption
Author: Riggle

You must be very wise to pass this one

rev.name: awesomeNESs
rev.desc:
Author: huksys

"A text-based adeventure for brave souls!"

I found this awesome looking game in a yard sale, but when I tried to play it at home I found out that the gameplay is sadly quite shallow, and I can't make it past level 1.

(I am not a game dev, pls don't flame me for the bad looks and game loop)

rev.name: guessy timezones
rev.desc:
Author: 4l3x42

This is a multiline challenge description!

Feel free to add more lines.

NOTE: The handout contains empty deploy.sh and deploy.bat files. Those files don't matter and you can ignore them!

web.name: Glacier AI Store
web.desc:
php
Author: sc0peMa3str0

2024 called and want back their casual websites, where you need to manually navigate through the page. This year, we introduce Glacier AI Store, where we use AI to navigate a website. Never browse through sub-sub-sub navigation bars again. Check out our new products. We apologize again to those customers, who paid for products but couldn't see them in their order list. We hired the best PHP vibe coders on the market and resolved the issue.

web.name: Glacier Echo
web.desc:
Author: h4ckd0tm3

High in the frozen north, an automated research outpost has gone silent. The Admins suspect that the research team may have uncovered something!

web.name: Glacier Profiles
web.desc:
Author: XSSKevin

Check out our new FrostFire Profiles website, which we launched today. We have invested a lot of time optimizing the site, so you can access it super fast

web.name: Glacier ToDo
web.desc:
Author: XSSKevin

Check out our new fancy todo app freshly deployed on our glacier servers. Create an account and manage your todos with ease.

web.name: intro
web.desc:
Author: XSSKevin

We are launching our new management board and have quite a lot of people using it. Everyone logs into it all the time. Check it out.
